dict.acceptation: 什么时候；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时；

sent.orig: A lie is as much a lie,when it is whispered or when it is proclaimed at the market cross.
sent.trans: 不管是小声低语还是在市场门口大声叫喊，谎言终归是谎言。

sent.orig: A man among men is he who knows when to eat humble pie and when to hold his head high.
An overdraft results when a note discounted at a bank is not met when due.
sent.trans: 银行贴现的支票到期而未能支付就成为透支。

sent.orig: Eggs are cheap when they are plentiful and they are dear when they are scare.
sent.trans: 鸡蛋多了就便宜，少了就贵。

sent.orig: Experience teachs me that whatever a fellow-guest may have of power to instruct or to amuse when he is sitting in a chair, or standing on a hearth-rug, quickly leaves him when he takes one out for a walk.
sent.trans: 经验告诉我们，无论哪一个与我一同作客的人，当他坐在椅子里或站在炉前地毯上的时候，他可能具有教导或逗乐的精力；当他陪别人出去散步的时候，他的这种精力很快就不见了。
